short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set your default search engine to Surf Encrypt!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Surf Encrypt protects your searches by encrypting your search data locally on your device and uses a unique encryption key every time you visit.

Your search term is not displayed anywhere that it would easily be seen - unlike other search engines it is excluded from your browser history, page title, search URL and the encrypted URLs expire after you're done with the website.

Safer to use on public computers and even at home you can prevent your family from knowing that you're planning a surprise vacation or searching for a special gift!
